Threat Intel - ViperSoftX RAT IOC
Date Added - 7/17/24

Summary: New Remote Access Trojan ViperSoftX Malware Disguises as eBooks on Torrents to Spread Stealthy Attacks

SOURCE:
1. https://www.trellix.com/blogs/research/the-mechanics-of-vipersofts-exploiting-autoit-and-clr-for-stealthy-powershell-execution/
2. https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/vipersoftx-malware-covertly-runs-powershell-using-autoit-scripting/
